name: Treehouse of Horror XXVII
director: Steven Dean Moore, Mike B. Anderson
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Joel H. Cohen
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: In the 27th annual ''Simpsons'' Halloween special, the children of Springfield fight to the death for a day in Mr. Burns' personal reservoir, Lisa's imaginary friend kills her real friends ...
